https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fgsWdUfrS9dbF93hXBdAgLmVF3c.jpg Captain Bruce Yamashita just wanted to serve his country; because of his race and ethnicity, the U.S. Marine Corps denied him the chance. Instead of giving in to discrimination, he took a stand for fairness and justice, uncovering evidence that rocked the Corps. A MOST UNLIKELY HERO presents Bruceâ€™s story as a model of courage and commitment in contemporary America. A Most Unlikely Hero
